title: Warn "Cannot determine null of mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location to register with the native image" in dev mode
body:
### Describe the bug

From what I gathered, `mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location` is a runtime property. Is it intended to show this warning? Especially in dev mode (I set `quarkus.package.type=native` in my application.yml)

```
2022-12-01 08:48:48,413 WARN  [io.qua.sma.jwt.dep.SmallRyeJwtProcessor] (build-43) Cannot determine null of mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location to register with the native image
__  ____  __  _____   ___  __ ____  ______ 
 --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/ 
 -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \   
--\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/   
2022-12-01 08:48:54,737 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) api 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT on JVM (powered by Quarkus 2.14.2.Final) started in 7.200s. Listening on: http://localhost:8089
2022-12-01 08:48:54,737 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Profile dev activated. Live Coding activated.
2022-12-01 08:48:54,737 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Installed features: [agroal, amazon-ses, cdi, config-yaml, hibernate-orm, hibernate-orm-panache-kotlin, hibernate-types, hibernate-validator, jdbc-mysql, kotlin, narayana-jta, oidc-client, oidc-client-reactive-filter, qute, reactive-routes, rest-client-reactive, rest-client-reactive-jackson, resteasy-reactive, resteasy-reactive-jackson, security, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-health, smallrye-jwt, smallrye-metrics, smallrye-openapi, swagger-ui, vertx]

```


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

https://github.com/bboyz269/quarkus-smallrye-jwt-warning

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)
